reviews.review_msg: I LOVE GREG. He is witty, understanding, and a fair marker. Makes classes interesting and relatable. SO happy he taught this class, and I hope you take him as well to know how awesome he is.
literally the nicest, spunkiest, greatest man i have met. his lectures can be a little disorganized but as long as you read the book and are on top of the assignments, class isnt mandatory.
